definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: Create a scrapbook of photos on your homescreen.
sentences.chinese: 可在你家裏的屏幕上創建一張照片剪貼簿。

sentences.english: Clears the Clipboard and then places nonpersistent data on it.
sentences.chinese: 清除剪貼簿，然後將非永續性資料置於其中。

sentences.english: Vellum preserves photographs on scrapbook pages.
sentences.chinese: 牛皮紙上保留了照片的剪貼簿頁面。

sentences.english: Places a specified non-persistent data object on the system Clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 將指定的非持續性資料物件放在系統剪貼簿上。

sentences.english: A digital Scrapbook in Birchwood with porcelain caps.
sentences.chinese: 一個樺木數字剪貼簿與瓷帽。

sentences.english: What scrapbook supplies do I use for creating memory books?
sentences.chinese: 我什麼剪貼簿用品用於創建內存書嗎？

sentences.english: Store your leaves in a scrapbook.
Need help with your scrapbooking project?
Some people use inspiration boards; others keep scrapbooks .
sentences.chinese: 有些人用的是靈感紙板，剪貼簿。

sentences.english: A scrapbook. Include photos and quotes and clippings and events.
sentences.chinese: 剪貼簿包含着照片，引證，剪報，和結果。

sentences.english: Pastes clipboard data to a table.
sentences.chinese: 將剪貼簿的資料貼上成新表格。

sentences.english: He came slowly, on crutches, clutching a big scrapbook .
sentences.chinese: 他拄着柺杖，走得慢慢地，挾着一本很大的剪貼簿。
